title: Noam Chomsky and Bonnie Bassler talk at Freedom Seminar, Columbia University
description:
These two talks were given on April 18, 2022 at graduate seminar, Drawing Lines: Non-Coercive Threats to Freedom, taught by Professors Akeel Bilgrami and Jonathan R. Cole. 

Noam Chomsky, Institute Professor Emeritus, MIT: 
"Language, freedom, communication"

1:11
Bonnie L. Bassler, Howard Hughes Medical Institute Investigator; Squibb Professor and Chair of Microbiology, Princeton University:
"Bacterial Conversations: Private and Public"
